pr_title: PLANNER-1976 Fix decreasing the cardinality of some constraint streams

timeline.message: PLANNER-1976 Fix decreasing cardinality of some constraint streams

timeline.bodyText:
Naming: noop() or noOp() or noOperation()?
Why do we need this method?
Does it need to be public?
timeline.author: ge0ffrey

timeline.bodyText: I am ok with doing it like this, but we could just as well do it as a default method on UniConstraintStream. Either way, it's all good.
timeline.author: ge0ffrey
